description.en-US:
Tetris 2023 is a widely popular puzzle game featuring geometric shapes called "tetrominos." These tetrominos are game pieces composed of four square blocks each. In Tetris, a random sequence of these tetrominos falls down the playing field. The objective of the game is to manipulate these tetrominos by moving them sideways and rotating them in 90-degree units. The goal is to create a horizontal line of ten units without any gaps.

When a player successfully forms such a line, it gets destroyed, and any blocks above the deleted line will fall down. Clearing a certain number of lines allows the player to advance to a new level. As the game progresses, each level increases the speed at which the tetrominos fall. The game continues until the stack of tetrominos reaches the top of the playing field and no new tetrominos can enter, at which point the game ends. Tetris challenges players' spatial and strategic skills as they strive to create solid lines and prevent the stack from reaching the top.
